page.title: 18WELSH LANGUAGE.
page.content: Concern is being continuously expressed about the number of people who can speak the{Welsh Language fluently.This concern is justified by recent research, which has revealed a dramatic decrease in the number of Welsh speaking school children.It is estimated that little over a quarter of the children in the area, however, are native speakers of Welsh and of all the children who come to school without any knowledge of Welsh less than 10 percent come to speak it fluently.Denbigh is, therefore, one of the critical areas of the Wales of the 80's as far as the language is concerned.Educationalists believe there is a need to safeguard the language of Welsh speakers and to persuade the non-Welsh speakers that easy communication and Welsh heritage are desirable objectives.
